name: LMNTL
description:
Fire Beats Gaia, Gaia Beats Water, Water Beats Fire.
A tale as old as time.

Attack with an Element by pressing their respective button pads.
defend your elements by pressing their pads when they are under attack!
Fire back after defending or losing a point!
First to 11 wins! Each point increases Attack speed!

This current version has no cool menus, background effects, score effects, sounds, win effect, etc.
It is simply a game loop, input handlers, and some fun particle balls.

I plan on adding more features and improvements in the future, but hopefully you can enjoy this early version!
